mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(stStatisticsDt, '%W') AS `name`, COUNT(`statistics_id`) AS 'data' FROM Statistics_tbl WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 7 GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY 'name'
SELECT slPageName AS 'name', FLOOR(COUNT(*)) AS 'data' FROM StatisticsLog_tbl WHERE slPageName IS NOT NULL GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY data DESC limit 0,10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `y`, stClientScreen AS `name` FROM Statistics_tbl WHERE stClientScreen IS NOT NULL AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(stStatisticsDt) <= 30 GROUP BY `name` ORDER BY `y` DESC
